entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gore Bay

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle. Temperature rising to 8 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Wind south 30 km/h. Temperature rising to 8 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of drizzle. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 in the morning then becoming west 30. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of drizzle. Low zero. POP 30%
